response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I believe its true worth exceeds $800,000, but considering the exclusivity and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am willing to extend this exceptional piece to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. Please let me know if you would like to explore this further or if you need more information about the product. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 750000}
